name: Upsolve AI
headline: Customer-facing analytics as a service, powered by AI.
description: Upsolve AI is a customer-facing analytics as a service platform. We are building a full data stack that enables businesses to build and offer analytics to their customers at lightning speed and gives their customers the superpower to answer any data questions via AI. The company is founded by Ka Ling Wu and Serguei Balanovich, who built a similar product at Palantir before (featured in Palantir's S-1), growing it to 50+ enterprise customers and 8-figures of annual revenue in 2 years.

founders.name: Ka Ling Wu, Founder
founders.description: Ka Ling is the Co-founder & CEO of Upsolve AI. Before Upsolve, Ka Ling led product solution development at nPlan, a Series A AI & Construction tech startup, focusing on client expansion. Before her stint at nPlan, she spent four years at Palantir where her responsibilities ranged from managing client engagements and stakeholder relationships to spearheading the creation of Palantir's HyperAuto product from inception to market launch. Ka Ling also opened the Korea market for Palantir.

founders.name: Serguei Balanovich, Founder & CTO
founders.description:
Serguei is the Co-founder & CTO of Upsolve. Before Upsolve, Serguei spent seven years at Palantir where he pioneered early Supply Chain and Manufacturing commercial work, and later productized this work into Palantir HyperAuto. Serguei also worked on Palantir Apollo as a dev lead.
Outside of software, Serguei loves puzzles, board games, and teaching.

**Upsolve AI: Empowering Analytics Through AI**

Upsolve AI is a fresh entrant in the realm of customer-facing analytics as a service, founded by the dynamic duo Ka Ling Wu and Serguei Balanovich, who previously made their mark at Palantir. Officially launched in 2023, Upsolve AI quickly joined Y Combinator's W24 batch—a clear testament to its potential. Their mission is simple yet powerful: to provide businesses with the tools to offer robust analytics to their customers, all powered by cutting-edge AI.

With just a team of four, Upsolve AI is focused on building a comprehensive data stack designed for speed and scalability. The platform empowers businesses to embed interactive dashboards and business intelligence capabilities right into their products from day one—eliminating the typical delays associated with analytics integration. In an industry where data insights are king, Upsolve AI gives its users the superpower to answer data questions swiftly and accurately, allowing them to make data-driven decisions without the engineering burden.

Their offerings include seamless connections with popular databases, a user-friendly interface for dashboard creation, and flexible customization options to match any company's unique design standards. They aim to maximize value for users, showcasing a remarkable potential to double the insights derived from product data without additional engineering costs.

Some highlights of Upsolve AI include:
- **Customer-Centric Features**: Businesses can build and customize dashboards that cater to individual client needs, driving tailored insights and actionable data.
- **Rapid Deployment**: The intuitive dashboard-building interface means your analytics can be operational in as little as a day.
- **Proven Leadership**: The founders' prior experience at Palantir speaks volumes, with their previous product scaling up to over 50 enterprise customers and generating eight-figure revenues in just two years.

Customer testimonials are already pouring in, praising the speed and adaptability that Upsolve AI brings to the table. From startups needing customizable analytics solutions to established businesses looking to refine their data offerings, Upsolve AI aims to remove the analytics burden and empower users to focus on their core products.

For companies eager to unlock their data’s potential, check out their offerings and stories at [Upsolve AI](https://upsolve.ai/). Whether you're looking to dive into customer analytics or want to explore how AI can enhance your decision-making, Upsolve AI positions itself as a compelling partner in the modern analytics landscape.
